short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: is a free, powerful extension for Shopify that allows one-click show of product data and store data

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Overview
MyShop Insights is a robust and user-friendly Shopify extension designed to revolutionize the way you access and view store and product information. This innovative tool seamlessly integrates with your Shopify dashboard, offering instant insights into both product basics and essential store details.

Key Features
Product Information at a Glance: With MyShop Insights, you can easily access comprehensive product data, including descriptions, pricing, and more, all in a user-friendly interface.
Store Details on Demand: Gain a thorough understanding of any Shopify store's fundamental information, including its history, best-selling products, and overall performance.
Efficient and Intuitive Design: Designed with efficiency in mind, MyShop Insights allows for quick and hassle-free information retrieval, enhancing your decision-making process.
Data Security and Privacy: Prioritizing your privacy, all data is processed locally on your computer. We ensure that your information remains confidential and secure.
Accessibility and Support

Disclaimer
Please note, MyShop Insights operates independently and is not officially affiliated with Shopify. We respect privacy and intellectual property rights and adhere to the highest standards of data ethics.
